pre.expressions.pre.expressions: if ($irspread=3) then ($irspread=$extend;$record=1);$irspread=nullsub(val($irspread, 1), 4)
$L.void=irspread($irspread)
$L.void={""}
if (gui() and false) then if ($search.open.flag="open") then (flag in $L.file=true) else if ($search.open.flag="closed") then (flag in $L.file=false) else (flag in $L.file=NULL)
$L.save.assign=assignment in $L.file;1 in $L.void=assignment in $L.file
if (not (null(assignment in $L.file)) and $search.assign.flag="secondary") then (secondary.assignment in $L.file=$L.void;assignment in $L.file=NULL)
if ($search.assign.flag="either") then (secondary.assignment in $L.file=NULL;assignment in $L.file=NULL)
if (not (null($L.save.assign)) and $search.assign.flag="either") then ($L.append.sql=" and (assignment #\""+$L.save.assign+"\" or secondary.assignment #\""+$L.save.assign+"\" )")
$L.rem="The following are the queries for ESS search screen when different contact fields are populated"
$L.opened.by=jscall("StringUtil.escapeAllStr", opened.by in $L.file)
$L.contact.service=jscall("StringUtil.escapeAllStr", contact.service in $L.file)
$L.contact.name=jscall("StringUtil.escapeAllStr", contact.name in $L.file)

if ($G.ess and not (null(opened.by in $L.file)) and null(contact.service in $L.file) and null(contact.name in $L.file)) then ($L.append.sql=" (opened.by#\""+$L.opened.by+"\" and (contact.service=\""+$lo.contact.name+"\" or contact.name=\""+$lo.contact.name+"\"))")

if ($G.ess and null(opened.by in $L.file) and not (null(contact.service in $L.file)) and null(contact.name in $L.file)) then ($L.append.sql=" ((opened.by=\""+$lo.contact.name+"\" or contact.name=\""+$lo.contact.name+"\") and contact.service#\""+$L.contact.service+"\")")

if ($G.ess and null(opened.by in $L.file) and null(contact.service in $L.file) and not (null(contact.name in $L.file))) then ($L.append.sql=" ((opened.by=\""+$lo.contact.name+"\" or contact.service=\""+$lo.contact.name+"\") and contact.name#\""+$L.contact.name+"\")")

if ($G.ess and not (null(opened.by in $L.file)) and not (null(contact.service in $L.file)) and null(contact.name in $L.file)) then ($L.append.sql=" (opened.by#\""+$L.opened.by+"\" and contact.service#\""+$L.contact.service+"\" and contact.name=\""+$lo.contact.name+"\")")

if ($G.ess and not (null(opened.by in $L.file)) and null(contact.service in $L.file) and not (null(contact.name in $L.file))) then ($L.append.sql=" (opened.by#\""+$L.opened.by+"\" and contact.service=\""+$lo.contact.name+"\" and contact.name#\""+$L.contact.name+"\")")

if ($G.ess and null(opened.by in $L.file) and not (null(contact.service in $L.file)) and not (null(contact.name in $L.file))) then ($L.append.sql=" (opened.by=\""+$lo.contact.name+"\" and contact.service#\""+$L.contact.service+"\" and contact.name#\""+$L.contact.name+"\")")

if ($G.ess and not (null(opened.by in $L.file)) and not (null(contact.service in $L.file)) and not (null(contact.name in $L.file))) then ($L.append.sql=" (opened.by#\""+$L.opened.by+"\" and contact.service#\""+$L.contact.service+"\" and contact.name#\""+$L.contact.name+"\") and (opened.by=$lo.contact.name or contact.service=$lo.contact.name or contact.name=$lo.contact.name)")

if ($G.ess and null(opened.by in $L.file) and null(contact.service in $L.file) and null(contact.name in $L.file)) then ($L.append.sql=" (opened.by=\""+$lo.contact.name+"\" or contact.service=\""+$lo.contact.name+"\" or contact.name=\""+$lo.contact.name+"\")")
if $G.ess then (if ($ess.status="Open") then ($L.ess.query=" and open~=\"Closed\"");if ($ess.status="Closed") then ($L.ess.query="and open=\"Closed\""))
if (not (null($L.ess.query))) then ($L.append.sql=$L.append.sql+$L.ess.query)
$L.rem="The following is set to allow incident approvers to View tickets in his/her approval inbox"
$filename.temp=""
$need.search.approvalinbox=false
if (not (null($L.file))) then ($filename.temp=filename($L.file))
$additional.query="false"

if ($filename.temp="probsummary" and not (null($L.external.query))) then ($L.approvalInbox.tiekets=jscall("ApprovalService.getPendingApprovalTickets", $L.external.query, $filename.temp);$additional.query=" number isin "+$L.approvalInbox.tiekets)
$L.append.sql=" and (("+$L.append.sql+") or ("+$additional.query+"))"
$L.rem="The following is set so that to prevent the contact fields to be set both in genquery and also by $L.append.sql"
if $G.ess then (opened.by in $L.file=NULL;contact.service in $L.file=NULL;contact.name in $L.file=NULL)
$L.rem="The following are the queries for ESS search screen when the value 'Other – See Description' is selected from the list of Affected items "
if ($G.ess and not (null($affected.ci.search)) and $affected.ci.search~="Other – See Description") then ($L.append.sql=$L.append.sql+" and affected.item=\""+$affected.ci.search+"\"")
if ($G.ess and $affected.ci.search="Other – See Description") then ($L.append.sql=$L.append.sql+" and affected.item=NULL")

post.rad.expressions.post.rad.expressions: if (not (null($L.inboxquery))) then if null($L.append.sql) then ($L.append.sql=$L.inboxquery) else ($L.append.sql=$L.append.sql+" and ("+$L.inboxquery+")")
